author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Glennon Small Companies Posts HY ‍Profit From Ordinary Activities After Tax Attributable Of A$5.7 Mln
text:
Feb 19 (Reuters) - Glennon Small Companies Ltd:
* HY ‍ PROFIT FROM ORDINARY ACTIVITIES AFTER TAX ATTRIBUTABLE TO MEMBERS $5.7 MILLION, UP 679.12%​
* ‍DIRECTORS DECLARED PAYMENT OF INTERIM ORDINARY DIVIDEND OF 1 CENT PER FULLY PAID SHARE, FULLY FRANKED​
* ‍HY REVENUE TO A$8.2 MILLION, UP 286.80 PERCENT * ALL FIGURES IN A$‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
